title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the action does not have any effect.
OB: Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and try to add Javadoc.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the Javadoc should successfully be added to the field.
SR: Investigate why adding Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view is not working correctly.
